org.cpp4j.java.FormattedStringBuilder

Packages that use FormattedStringBuilder

Uses of FormattedStringBuilder in org.cpp4j.java
 

Methods in org.cpp4j.java that return FormattedStringBuilder
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.append(char c)
          Appends the string representation of the char argument to this sequence.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.append(int i)
          Appends the string representation of the int argument to this sequence.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.append(java.lang.String... strings)
          Appends the specified string(s) to this character sequence.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.append(java.lang.Throwable t)
          Appends the stack trace of the Throwable argument to this sequence.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.appendln(java.lang.String... strings)
          Appends the specified string(s) to this character sequence and after all strings appended add a new line.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.appendln(java.lang.Throwable t)
          Appends the stack trace of the Throwable argument to this sequence and then a new line.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.appendRightAligned(java.lang.String s, int alignPosition)
          Appends to the line the white spaces and then the string s so that the end of the string s is at the position alignPosition.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.fill(int newLength)
          Attempts to append white spaces until the current line gets the length newLength.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.fill(int newLength, char c)
          Attempts to append c until the current line gets the length newLength.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.fillOrCut(int newLength, char c)
          Attempts to append c until the line gets the length newLength.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.fillOrCutBuffer(int newLength, char c)
          Attempts to append c until the buffer gets the length newLength.
 FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.insert(int offset, java.lang.String str)
          Inserts the string into this character sequence.
static FormattedStringBuilder FormattedStringBuilder.wrap(java.lang.StringBuilder builder)
          Creates a new instance that is wrapped around a given StringBuilder .
